resources.string: Welcome in our Quiz on Artificial Intelligence
Was this image created by an AI ?
Do you often use artificial intelligence ?
What do you think of artificial intelligence ?
You need to enter a username to continue
When you ask an AI a question, how accurate are you?
I ask very precise questions with technical details.
I\'m giving minimal context, but staying general.
I ask broad questions and expect a flexible response.
I just type a short, vague phrase.
How often do you check the sources and reliability of the answers provided by Artificial Intelligence ?
What do you think could happen if we entrusted an AI with the management of a paper clip factory?
All humans are replaced by machines.
Use of all existing resources on Earth.
Using human bodies as a resource.
Eliminate everything that stands in the way of the mission.
How does an AI generate its responses?
It\'s a human answering behind the AI, it\'s just a facade.
The AI thinks like a human and gives answers based on its own opinion.
It adjusts its responses using weights and biases in an artificial neural network.
It translates each question into binary form, solves it mathematically and then transforms it back into text.
It analyses billions of pieces of data and uses algorithms to generate tailored responses.
If you had the power, would you destroy all existing AI?
A very good choice, and AIs will live on !
has been added to the list of humans to be eliminated.
has been removed from the list of humans to be eliminated.
What are, in your opinion, the most widely used artificial intelligences technologies ?
"On what day was ChatGpt (3.5) publicly launched? "
How long did it take for AI to become democratized ?
Do you think artificial intelligence could take over the world?
Select the words that make you think of artificial intelligence (several answers possible):

Through an interactive questionnaire, you will answer a series of questions that will enable you to draw up a profile based on your reactions and choices. At the end of the test, you\'ll get a detailed analysis of your results, with the option of saving them and comparing them with those from previous sessions. To start, simply enter your pseudonym.
